document_data.name: Long Night
document_data.mainbody: The '''Long Night''' was an annual [[druid]]ic festival celebrated in the [[Vilhon Reach]] in early [[Eleasis]].
document_data.Description: The festival was a celebration of love that lasted for two consecutive nights across all areas of the Vilhon Reach inhabited by druids. The celebration was used to announce and celebrate betrothals and its ending marked the official beginning of the summer season in the Reach.
document_data.History: During the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, and the raging [[Godswar]], the deity [[Silvanus]]'s avatar roamed the lush forests of the Vilhon Reach. He visited the isle of [[Iligh√¥n]] during that year's Long Night and gifted a boon of his ''blessing'' onto the island.
